products.title: Penrith Sandstone Roman Blind
products.description: The penrith sandstone roman blind carries a versatile tone, somewhere between the warmth of neutral beige and the contemporary vibes of modern greys. With that in mind, this blind would look fabulous in a whole spectrum of settings, from fresh bedrooms to rustic lounges.
